about.text: I'm a conversion-focused email copywriter with 7 years of experience crafting email sequences that consistently outperform industry benchmarks. Specializing in the complete customer journey - from first welcome to loyal advocate - I combine psychological triggers with compelling storytelling to create emails that get opened, read, and acted upon. My approach blends data-driven optimization with creative messaging that resonates on a human level. I've helped SaaS companies, e-commerce brands, and service providers generate millions in additional revenue through strategic email copy that builds relationships while driving measurable business results.

testimonials.text: Alexandra's email sequences transformed our business. She took our 12% conversion rate to 28% in just three months. Her ability to understand our audience and craft messages that resonate is unparalleled. We've hired many copywriters over the years, but none have delivered results like this.
